Pre-Game Insights: West Indies are looking to make a strong start in the T20 World Cup 2024 after a disappointing performance in the last two editions.
PNG have a lot of experienced players, but they might find it challenging to overcome the in-form West Indians.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is scheduled to take place on June 2, 2024, in Providence.
West Indies have a strong team, with players like Nicholas Pooran, Andre Russell, Rovman Powell, and Shimron Hetmyer in form.
Others: PNG have ten players who played in the 2021 T20 World Cup, and only four of their players are below 25.
West Indies are a pace-dominated side, with Gudakesh Motie being their highest wicket-taker and Brandon King being the highest run-scorer against South Africa in their recent series.
